description: Sets the background colour (BackgroundColor)
method_declaration: public void setBackgroundColor(PDGamma backgroundColor)

description: Set the noZoom flag
method_declaration: public void setNoZoom(boolean noZoom)

description: Sets the blend mode in the current graphics state
method_declaration: public void setBlendMode(BlendMode blendMode)

description: Get the hidden flag
method_declaration: public boolean isHidden()

description: Sets the optional Domain entry for this shading
method_declaration: public void setDomain(COSArray newDomain)

description: Sets the the non-stroking color space
method_declaration: public void setNonStrokingColorSpace(PDColorSpace colorSpace)

description: Get the size of the embedded file
method_declaration: public int getSize()

description: Create the right 'Validator' object for the given font type
method_declaration: protected FontValidator<? extends FontContainer<? extends PDFont>> getFontValidator(PreflightContext context, PDFont font)

description: This method checks the inputItem dictionary and call the exploreOutlineLevel method on the first child if it is not null
method_declaration: protected boolean validateItem(PreflightContext ctx, PDOutlineItem inputItem) throws ValidationException

description: Returns a styled instance
method_declaration: protected PDFont style(BaseFont font, TextStyle style)

description: merges two arrays
method_declaration: private void mergeArray(COSName name, COSDictionary dest, COSDictionary source)

description: The Lang element is optional but it is recommended. This method check the Syntax of the Lang if this entry is present
method_declaration: private void validateLang(PreflightContext ctx)

description: This method validates if OpenAction entry contains forbidden action type. It checks too if an Additional Action is present
method_declaration: private void validateActions(PreflightContext ctx) throws ValidationException

description: Calculate font size
method_declaration: private static float calculateFontSize(Matrix textMatrix, PDTextState textState)

description: Return true if the ID of the first dictionary is the same as the id of the last dictionary Return false otherwise
method_declaration: protected boolean compareIds(COSDictionary first, COSDictionary last)

description: Extracts and compares first and last trailers for PDF version between 1.1 and 1.4
method_declaration: protected void checkTrailersForLinearizedPDF14(PreflightContext ctx)

description: Check if the given character code has already been processed
method_declaration: private boolean isAlreadyProcessed(int code) throws GlyphException

description: Check the Extended Graphic State contains in the ShadingPattern dictionary if it is present. To check this ExtGState, this method uses the net.awl.edoc.pdfa.validation.graphics.ExtGStateContainer object
method_declaration: protected void checkGraphicState(PreflightContext context, PDPage page, PDShading shadingRes) throws ValidationException

description: Return true if the FontDescriptor has only one FontFile entry
method_declaration: protected boolean hasOnlyOneFontFile(PDFontDescriptor fontDescriptor)

description: Check dictionary entries. Only the Length entry is mandatory. In a PDF/A file, F, FFilter and FDecodeParms are forbidden
method_declaration: protected void checkDictionaryEntries(PreflightContext context, COSStream streamObj)

description: This method checks if one of declared Filter is LZWdecode. If LZW is found, the result list is updated with an error code
method_declaration: protected void checkFilters(COSStream stream, PreflightContext context)

description: Check if mandatory keys of linearized dictionary are present
method_declaration: protected void checkLinearizedDictionary(PreflightContext ctx, COSDictionary linearizedDict)

description: Put the element to check on the top of the ValidationPath and call the validation method on the Process
method_declaration: private static void callValidation(PreflightContext context, Object element, String processName) throws ValidationException

description: Extract all hyperlinks from a PDF file and save them to a CSV file
method_declaration: public static void extractHyperlinks(String pdfFilePath, String csvOutputPath)

description: Merge several PDF files into one, adding a watermark to each page of the merged document
method_declaration: public static void mergePdfFilesWithWatermark(String[] pdfPaths, String outputPath, String watermarkText)

description: Convert each page of a PDF document into a separate image file, adjusting the resolution based on page content
method_declaration: public static void convertPdfToImages(String pdfFilePath, String imagesOutputDir, int resolution)

description: Encrypt a PDF file with a user password and an owner password, restricting printing and copying
method_declaration: public static void encryptPdf(String inputPdfPath, String outputPdfPath, String userPassword, String ownerPassword)

description: Create a PDF document from a collection of image files, setting metadata such as title and author
method_declaration: public static void createPdfFromImages(String[] imagePaths, String pdfOutputPath, Map<String, String> metadata)

description: Split a PDF document into individual pages, each saved as a new PDF file, and apply a header and footer to each page
method_declaration: public static void splitPdfAndAddHeaderFooter(String pdfFilePath, String outputDir, String headerText, String footerText)

description: Automatically redact specific keywords in a PDF file and save the redacted version
method_declaration: public static void redactKeywordsInPdf(String pdfFilePath, String outputPdfPath, String[] keywords)

description: Extract the table of contents from a PDF file and print its structure to a JSON file
method_declaration: public static void extractTableOfContentsToJson(String pdfFilePath, String jsonOutputPath)

description: Generate a PDF report from a dataset, including charts and tables, and set document permissions
method_declaration: public static void generatePdfReport(String dataPath, String pdfOutputPath)

description: Perform OCR on scanned PDF documents to extract text and save the text in a structured format
method_declaration: public static void performOcrOnPdf(String scannedPdfPath, String textOutputPath)

description: Compare two PDF files page by page and highlight differences in a new PDF file
method_declaration: public static void comparePdfFiles(String pdfFilePath1, String pdfFilePath2, String comparisonOutputPath)

description: Analyze the layout of a PDF file and generate a report on its formatting styles (fonts, colors, spacing)
method_declaration: public static void analyzePdfLayout(String pdfFilePath, String reportOutputPath)

description: Create a PDF slideshow from a set of PDF files, setting transition effects and timings
method_declaration: public static void createPdfSlideshow(String[] pdfFilePaths, String slideshowOutputPath, int[] transitionTimes)

description: Extract annotations and comments from a PDF file and save them in a structured format
method_declaration: public static void extractAnnotations(String pdfFilePath, String outputFilePath)

description: Digitally sign a PDF file using a provided digital certificate and save the signed version
method_declaration: public static void digitallySignPdf(String pdfFilePath, String signedPdfPath, String certificatePath, String certificatePassword)

description: Batch process multiple PDF files to compress their size without significant loss of quality
method_declaration: public static void compressMultiplePdfs(String[] pdfFilePaths, String outputDir)

description: Create a fillable PDF form with various field types (text, checkbox, dropdown) and export it
method_declaration: public static void createFillablePdfForm(String outputPath, Map<String, String> fieldTypes)

description: Implement a PDF version converter to downgrade PDF files to an earlier version for compatibility
method_declaration: public static void convertPdfVersion(String inputPdfPath, String outputPdfPath, String targetVersion)

description: Extract embedded media files (audio, video) from a PDF document and save them to a specified directory
method_declaration: public static void extractMediaFromPdf(String pdfFilePath, String mediaOutputDir)

description: Generate a PDF calendar with customizable themes and holidays highlighted, and print user events
method_declaration: public static void generatePdfCalendar(String year, String theme, Map<String, List<String>> holidays, Map<String, String> events, String outputPath)
